item.title: Micro Snippets
item.description: Micro Snippets - add dynamic functionality to your static site Welcome to Micro Snippets! Micro Snippets is a collection of embeddable html widgets to give dynamic functionality to your static sites. The backend is running on M3o. It is free.

item.title: Posts
item.description: Posts - embed posts in your static site Transform your static brochure site into an actual blog. Get Posts Display blogs.
